评论概述: Very comfortable! But not short people friendly
评论详情: These pants are beyond comfortable and they fit perfectly around my hips and i love the bagginess, however, one problem -- i am 5'1, the sleeves of these pants are abit too baggy, it's hard to walk with them on. So, If you're 5'1 and smaller i do NOT RECOMMEND. if you're taller then yes! Definitely worth the price.

I had wanted to get these pants for myself for a while but I didn’t had a prime account nor the money, but now I currently have both! I, a male, wanted to buy these pants (despite them being for women), since they looked very comfy, plus I love baggy clothing. I ordered one in the largest size available to see if they fit me or not. They fitted me perfectly, to the point where my feet are touching the pants!!!!! Not only were they baggy, but also felt very comfy, and I love the material! The pockets were also deep, which were perfect for me! Not only that, but despite people disliking the swishy noises, I love the swishy noises! They give me flashbacks and nostalgia to my younger days where I would have pants that make swishy noises! I got all the colors! I recommend getting these pants if you love comfy clothing, regardless if you are male or female!

I LOVE these pants!! I'm a skinny girl whose body is 80% legs, and it's hard finding pants that will fit the length of my legs - to say nothing of fitting the waistband. Most things are just too baggy, so I've learned I usually have to try things on before I buy them. UNTIL THESE PANTS. I read all of the reviews and decided which size to get based on what people said about how they fit. For reference, I'm 5'7, 107lbs, 31" hips. I went with a Medium, and they fit so nicely!! I like the oversized look and that's exactly what these are. Not too long, but they just cover my heels while sitting pretty at the level of my navel. 10/10 recommend these pants!!
